title: glutmainloop on mac freezes application (cgo)
body:
by **eduard.castany**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. gcc a.c -framework OpenGL -framework GLUT && ./a.out
2. in a.c change "int main(" to "int yeah("
3. go run a.go           (this will freeze)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
mac (Lion)

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
weekly.2012-02-22 +96bd78e7d35e
Attachments: 1. a.c (2001 bytes) 1. a.go (440 bytes)
